TEXT: I. THE CIRCUMSTANCES OF THE CASE
CARDINAL . The applicant is a NORP national belonging to the NORP ethnic minority . He was born in DATE and lived in PERSON until DATE . Since DATE he has been an asylum seeker in GPE .

CARDINAL . ORG submitted that despite all their efforts they had been unable to verify most of the facts of the present case owing to a lack of cooperation on the part of the authorities of the self - proclaimed “ NORP Republic of Transdniestria ” ( the “ FAC ) . They had therefore proceeded , broadly speaking , on the basis of the facts as submitted by the applicant .
CARDINAL . ORG did not make any submissions in respect of the facts of the case .
